_meanings:
{@--1@} A maid-servant or
female attendant in the women's
apartments (a woman of the mixed
tribe described in {#sEraMDra#} 2).

{@--2@} An
independent female artisan working
in another person's house.

{@--3@} An
epithet of Draupadī (assumed by
her when she acted as servant to
Sudheṣṇā, queen of Virāṭa.).
